FAQ | Perdido Key RV Resort & Marina Skip to content 13770 River Road, Pensacola, FL 32507 850-492-7304 Facebook Youtube Instagram Stay With Us RV Sites Marina Sites Condo Rentals Resort Amenities Resort Guidelines Resort Map Things To Do The Resort Rates FAQ Gallery Events Contact Stay With Us RV Sites Marina Sites Condo Rentals Resort Amenities Resort Guidelines Resort Map Things To Do The Resort Rates FAQ Gallery Events Contact MAKE A RESERVATION Frequently Asked Questions How close are you to the Gulf? We are conveniently located: Approximately 1/2 mile from Gulf Islands National Seashore. Approximately 2 ‚Äì 4 miles from public beach access points. These distances ensure easy access to the beautiful Gulf beaches for your enjoyment during your stay at our RV Resort. If you have any questions about beach access or need recommendations for nearby attractions, our staff is available to assist you. Are you Pet Friendly? Yes, we are pet friendly! To ensure a safe and enjoyable environment for all guests, we ask that pets are not aggressive and are always kept on a leash that is no longer than 6 feet. These guidelines help maintain a friendly atmosphere where everyone can relax and enjoy their time at our RV Resort. If you have any questions about our pet policies or need recommendations for nearby pet-friendly attractions, our staff is available to assist you. Can I have a dog fence on my site? Yes, we allow dog fences on your patio area only, with the following guidelines: The fence should not exceed 6 feet by 6 feet in size. These guidelines ensure the safety and comfort of all guests and their pets while maintaining the aesthetics of our resort. If you have any questions or need further clarification on our pet policies, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact our staff for assistance. How many cars can I have in your RV Park? You are allowed 1 to 2 vehicles, depending on the type of site you have reserved. Please check your specific site details or contact our office for clarification regarding vehicle limits. We strive to accommodate our guests while ensuring safety and convenience throughout the resort. If you have any further questions or need assistance , our staff is here to help. Do you have grills at the site/townhomes? No, we do not provide grills at our sites. Additionally, we kindly request that guests refrain from placing grills, cooktops, or any hot items on our vinyl-wrapped picnic tables. This helps us maintain the quality and appearance of our amenities for everyone‚Äôs enjoyment. If you have any questions about alternative cooking arrangements or local grilling options, please feel free to ask our staff for recommendations. Do you allow wood burning fires? No, we do not allow wood-burning fire pits , solo stoves or any types of fi reworks at our resort. We permit only propane-fueled fire pits and solar powered tiki torches for safety and environmental reasons. This helps us maintain a clean and safe environment for all our guests to enjoy. Where do I get propane for my RV? Ace Hardware just across the bridge , and Tractor S upply is 5 miles away close to Walmart and Target. Can I wash my RV/Boat/Vehicle? Yes, you are welcome to wash your RV at our resort. Please note that there is a fee associated with washing. Additionally, for your convenience, there are RV wash companies available that can come directly to your site to wash your RV. If you need recommendations for RV wash companies, this information is inside the packet you receive at check in. Where do I place out going mail? Please place outgoing mail in the office. Our staff will ensure it is collected and sent out promptly for you. If you have any specific instructions or need assistance with postage, feel free to ask our office staff for help. Can we receive packages while at the RV Resort? Yes, you can receive packages while staying at our RV Resort. Please provide the following address for deliveries: 13770 River Road, Pensacola, Florida 32507.¬† Please make sure your name is on the package. Our office staff will accept and hold packages for you until you are ready to pick them up. If you have any specific delivery instructions or need assistance with receiving packages, please feel free to contact our office for further assistance. Is your pool heated? Yes, our pool is heated for your comfort. Additionally, during the summer months, the pool is cooled to ensure a refreshing experience even on warmer days. We strive to maintain enjoyable swimming conditions year-round for our guests‚Äô relaxation and enjoyment. Where do I put my trash? You may set your trash out at the end of your site in the gravel area only in the morning hours between 6:00 am and 10:30 am. All other trash will need to be taken to the dumpster located at the entrance of the park. Can I have a tent on my site? No, placing tents on RV sites or our beach area is not permitted . We prioritize maintaining the quality and appearance of our grounds for all guests. If you require additional space or accommodations , please contact our staff for alternative options that may better suit your needs. We‚Äôre here to ensure your stay is comfortable and enjoyable within our resort guidelines. Can I have a rug on my site? Yes, you are permitted to place a rug specifically on the concrete patio area of your RV site. This helps maintain the cleanliness and appearance of the site while still allowing you to personalize and enhance your outdoor space. Please ensure that the rug is suitable for outdoor use and does not obstruct pathways or create any safety hazards. If you have any questions about specific guidelines or recommendations for rugs, our staff will be happy to assist you. How do I get to your raised beach area? There is a sidewalk between sites 8 and 9 that will take you to the sitting beach or marina. Can I fish off the marina piers? We do not allow fishing off the piers. Can I swim at your beach area? Our beach is not designated for swimming due to the presence of marina deep water slips and regular boat traffic. For your safety, we recommend enjoying swimming at nearby Gulf beaches, which are easily accessible and offer safe, designated swimming areas. Our friendly staff can provide directions and recommendations for the best local swimming spots. Where can I park my boat trailer? You may park your boat trailer on your site or at the exit there will be additional parking for additional vehicles and trailers. Where to go if I need immediate medical attention? If you need medical attention during your stay, there are several nearby facilities that can assist you: Nearest Emergency Center : HCA Florida Perdido Bay Emergency, located at 9400 US 98 is approximately 9.5 miles away from the resort. Emergency Services : In case of a medical emergency, please call 911 immediately for the quickest response. For any assistance in locating these facilities or for further information, our front desk staff is available to help you 24/7. About Us Playa del Rio RV Resort Playa del Rio RV Resort Playa del Rio RV Resort Playa del Rio RV Resort Home About Us Rates Gallery Resort Map Policies Contact Playa del Rio RV Resort Playa del Rio RV Resort Playa del Rio RV Resort Playa del Rio RV Resort Home About Us Rates Gallery Resort Map Policies Contact More Home About Us Rates Gallery Resort Map Policies Contact Home About Us Rates Gallery Resort Map Policies Contact About Us Amenities Playa del Rio is a boutique RV Resort located on beautiful Perdido Key, Florida, an island located between Pensacola, Florida and Orange Beach, Alabama.¬† The PDR is the only RV Park on the Gulf Coast with its own Private Beach Access on the Gulf of Mexico just across from our¬†entrance and its own Private Boat Marina on Ole' River on the bayside end of the resort.¬† Located less than one-half mile from the AL / FL state line where the world-famous Flora Bama is located makes the¬†PDR the perfect vacation location conveniently located near everything you need.¬† You can spend your days at the resort fishing, crabbing, boating, swimming, kayaking, combing the beach for shells, soaking up the sun or just napping in a hammock.¬† Or, you can venture out to one of the many local attractions, amusement parks, zoos, museums, lifestyle centers, golf courses, shopping centers, music venues, or selections of great bars and awesome restaurants. The Playa del Rio RV Resort has 27 back-in RV sites and accepts up to 42' Motorhomes, 42' Fifth Wheels, 38' Travel Trailers (end-to-end size) and self-contained Truck Campers; and the Playa del Rio Marina has 9 boat slips and accepts up to 34' boats. ¬†¬†We do not allow tent camping, and we do not allow pop-up campers unless they have a bathroom. ¬†We do not offer any boat or trailer storage; and trailers are no allowed on the property unless pre-approved by the rental office by email (car dollies are always welcome, but car haulers must be discussed). ¬†¬†The Playa del Rio loves pets, and we have a small dog park for your little family members!¬† The Playa del Rio has a 24-hour laundry facility and a beautiful waterfront riverside pavilion for your enjoyment with¬†a cooking pavilion,¬†picnic area, crab and fishing dock and lots of places to relax and enjoy paradise.¬† ¬†For your convenience we have an ice maker and offer ice to our guests for your boating and beach time. All of our sites are Full Hookup sites with 30/50 Amp Power,¬†Water, Sewer and Cable; and we have complimentary WIFI throughout the resort.¬† ¬†We DO NOT have bathroom / shower facilities. ¬†¬†All RVs are required to be fully self-contained with plumbing and a bathroom. The Playa del Rio is ... Just a Little Laid Back RV Park at the Beach ‚Ñ¢ ... where ... It's like Living in a Postcard ‚Ñ¢ OWN YOUR OWN PIECE OF PARADISE! The Playa del Rio is excited to announce that we have sold 21 of the 26 available RV Sites. ¬†¬†Currently, we have one Premium Waterfront Site available (Site #15) being offered for $349,000. ¬†¬†¬†This beautiful site can accommodate a 36' RV and one vehicle. ¬†¬†This site also comes with complimentary boat slip usage for five (5) years (a $25,000 value). ¬†¬†Whether you want to purchase a lot for personal enjoyment, for your family beach vacation home, or to rent out for some extra income, you will LOVE this site and you will LOVE the PDR. ¬†¬†For more information, email Mark A. McBride at our office today! Making a Reservation You can book your reservations 24/7/365 through our online Reservations Booking System at your convenience. ¬†¬†¬†If you have any questions regarding the resort, you can send us a message through our website at CONTACT US, DROP US A LINE or EMAIL playadelriorvresort@gmail.com . ¬†¬†¬†All boat slip rental requests and monthly RV site rental requests must be submitted by email. Contact Us Our Rates March 1 - May 20 Nightly:¬† $119 Weekly:¬† $833 Monthly:¬† $1,850 May 21 - July 31 Nightly:¬† $149 Weekly:¬† $1,043 Monthly: ¬†$4,470 August 1 - September 14 Nightly:¬† $99 Weekly:¬† $693 Monthly:¬† $1,450 September 15 - February 28 Nightly:¬† $89 Weekly:¬† $623 Monthly:¬† $1,450 November Monthly Rate: ¬†$1,750 All reservations are booked at nightly rates through our online booking system. ¬†All reservations for a month or more will be booked through the system at the nightly rate; then once received by our reservations office, the rate will be adjusted to the monthly rate posted on our website at the time of booking. ¬†¬†See Below for Blackout Dates & Special Rates. Annual Lease: ¬†$1,400 / month plus power bill. ¬†¬†As of May 1, 2025, we do not have any RV sites available for annual leases. ¬†To be put on our waiting list for long-term leases, please email our reservations office for further information. Boat Slip Rates: ¬†¬†$55/night or $500/month lease No utilities are provided for boat slips; water is provided for cleaning your boat and flushing out your motors. ¬†¬†Email our rental office for boat slip rental requests and to check availability. ¬†For guests staying at the PDR with an RV, boat rentals are for the same number of nights as the RV site rental, and boats may be docked for normal check-in and check-out times. ¬†¬†Boats can be docked after 1:00 pm and no later than 8:00 pm on the arrival day of your docking. ¬†Once the boat has been docked, you will have access to our marina and your boat anytime, and your boat must be removed before 11:00 am on the date of your departure. ¬†If you are unable to dock before 8:00 pm on the date of your arrival, you will be required to wait until the following morning to dock your boat so that our Team Rio Staff is available to assist. ¬†¬†There is no parking for boat trailers on resort property; you must park your boat trailer off-site. Rates for Holidays, Special Events and Blackout Dates vary and are priced on the online booking calendar. ¬†¬†Some dates require minimum night stays. ¬†The monthly rate for November is $1,750. ¬†The monthly rate for May is from May 1st to May 20th. ¬†The monthly rates for January and February are based on calendar months. ¬†¬†Blackout dates that may require higher nightly rates and minimum night stays include but are not limited to: ¬†Memorial Day weekend ($199 nightly rate), Fourth of July weekend ($199 nightly rate), Labor Day weekend ($129 nightly rate), Mullet Toss weekend ($199 nightly rate), Music Festivals and Concerts (rates vary depending on event), Easter weekend ($129 nightly rate), Mother's Day weekend ($129 nightly rate), Father's Day weekend ($129 nightly rate), Thanksgiving ($99 nightly rate), Christmas ($99 nightly rate), New Years Eve ($109 nightly rate), Blue Angels summer show ($199 nightly rate) and Blue Angels fall show ($119 nightly rate). Reservations are Required. ¬†¬†Rates are Subject to change, but rates are guaranteed¬†at time of confirmation. ¬†Sales tax on RV Site rentals is 12.5% and sales tax on Boat Slip Rentals is 7.5%. ¬†¬†All reservations are charged a non-cash adjustment credit card processing convenience fee of 3.5% [Notice: ¬†Our old convenience fee has expired as of 12/31/24 and our current fee is 3.5% effective 01/01/25]. ¬†If you wish to avoid the additional non-cash adjustment convenience fee, you can pay cash upon arrival. ¬†¬†To pay with cash, you will be required to email our office upon booking your reservation online advising the office of your desire to pay cash and also note cash payment upon arrival in the special instructions box when you book your online reservation so that we can update your reservation information (cash payment cannot be may to reservations made within 72 hours of your arrival date). ¬†All reservations deposit fees must be paid by credit card at time of booking. ¬†¬†¬†Our rates are based on 2 adults (17 years or older) and 3 children (we do not charge for children under 2 years old) included in the price. ¬†All additional people are $5 per person per night. ¬†We offer a few premium water view and waterfront sites for an extra $10 per night cost or $200 per month cost on monthly rentals during our peak season. We charge a non-refundable reservation fee (to guarantee your reservation) in the amount of $100 for 2-3 night bookings, a fee of $200 for 4-7 night bookings, and a fee of $300 for 8-31 night bookings. ¬†All 1-night reservations are charged and paid in full at time of booking. ¬†The Reservation Fees for blackout dates and monthly bookings may vary based on the event, holiday and season. ¬†All reservation fees are applied to rent and deducted from your total balance as a payment at check-in. ¬†¬†Reservation fees are non-refundable (we only issue in-resort credits for qualifying cancellations -- we are a no refund RV Park). ¬†¬†¬†The Playa del Rio accepts reservations up to 2 years in advance, and we highly recommend reservations being booked as far in advance as you are able to assure that you can get into the PDR! ¬†We do not issue refunds or in-resort credits for late arrivals and for early departures. ¬†¬†See Policies for Cancelation Policies. MAKE A RESERVATION Our New Online Reservations System now allows you to book on line 24/7/365 -- just click on BOOK NOW. ¬†¬†We appreciate your business and we look forward to seeing you at the PDR soon! I believe they call it Old River.  There i... more We had a great 7 days here.  The resort is very nice and clean.  The staff were very pleasant and helpful.  The location is just over a mile from the closest public beach but we usually went to one of the state park locations about 3 miles away.  The resort is on water that connects two bays.  I believe they call it Old River.  There is a ‚Äúbeach‚Äù area at the docks for the marina, which is part of the resort.  It is an interesting blend of RVers and boaters.  The resort has a nice pool, laundry room and a clean bath house, although there is only one shower in both bathrooms.  The RV pads are gravel, well maintained, level but narrow.  Full hook-ups all around.  We found the sewage hook-up a little high causing some aggravation getting the sewage to flow even with an elevator. Our pad was right next to the pool and laundry which was convient.  There is a high bridge close by which had some road noise but wasn‚Äôt too bad.  We had no issues with other camper noise. The internet service and cable tv hook-ups worked very well.  There is Publix and Winn-Dixie grocery stores just on the other side of the bridge about 5 minutes away.  Perdido Key is a great beach area that is not commercialized like nearby Pensacola Beach or Destin are.  We seldom had issues finding parking or space on the beach. Description Perdido Key RV Resort is your home away from home, with 56 RV site rentals featuring full hook-ups to 30/50 amp electricity, water, sewer, cable TV, wi-fi, pool (heated/chilled), clubhouse, and laundry facilities. Come Experience Perdido Key Perdido Key is a small barrier island located just west of Pensacola Florida in the Gulf of Mexico. A travelers dream and sportsmans paradise Our beaches, bays, rivers and intracoastal waterways are perfect for any type of outdoor activity from fishing, boating, sailing, diving, dolphin watching, parasailing or just enjoying the beach collecting seashells and sand dollars. Our small quaint coastal community ensures every visitor can enjoy a private beach all to themselves. Gulf Coast seafood is something beyond words and our local dining establishments are masters at creating a culinary experience giving you a true taste of the local life. Enjoy the atmosphere and watch the boats go by at sunset while indulging in fresh, local caught seafood and a glass of your favorite wine. Or maybe you get lucky fishing and want to try your hand at cooking your own catch. Visit the market and they will help you with advice and ingredients. Pensacola is rich in history being the first settlement in the U.S. There are several significant sites to be seen like the legendary Ft. Pickens where Geronimo was held captive and our beautiful Downtown area that still has a ‚ÄúMain St‚Äù feel. One of our most proud titles is being home to the U.S. Navy and Blue Angels.
